titleInfo.title: al-Taqsīm wa-al-tashjīr التقسيم والتشجير al-Rāzī, Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā الرازي، أبو بكر محمد بن زكريا and Nihayat al-ikhtiṣār fī ‘ilm al-farā’iḍ نهاية الاختصار في علم الفرائض Ibn al-Labbān, Muḥammad ibn ‘Abd Allāh ابن اللبان، محمد بن عبد الله

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Eastern wove paper (ff. 1-3 replaced with Western laid paper; with ' tre lune'watermark visible in gutter on ff. 1 and 2)Dimensions: 200 x 150 mm leaf [145 x 115 mm written]Foliation: Eastern Arabic foliation in black ink; British Museum foliation in pencilRuling: No ruling visible; 17 lines per page; vertical spacing 12 lines per 10 cmScript: NaskhInk: Black inkBinding: British Museum bindingCondition: Minor soiling and candle wax spots; ff. 1-3 replaced; ff. 109 and 110 mutilated and repaired with some loss of text on f. 110v, which is heavily soiledMarginalia: Few marginalia by more than one hand; more on ff. 107v-110v (item 2)Seals: None

mods.abstract: The manuscript was copied in Egypt as indicated by the Coptic numerals used in the table of contents on ff. 3r-4v.Contents:(1) al-Rāzī, Abū Bakr Muḥammad ibn Zakarīyā (الرازي، أبو بكر محمد بن زكريا), al-Taqsīm wa-al-tashjīr(التقسيم والتشجير; ff. 1v-107r);(2) Ibn al-Labbān, Muḥammad ibn ‘Abd Allāh (ابن اللبان، محمد بن عبد الله), Nihayat al-ikhtiṣār fī ‘ilm al-farā’iḍ(نهاية الاختصار في علم الفرائض; ff. 107v-110v).
